AirElemental.EffectNote: you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to that creature until the start of your next turn.

Ape.EffectNote: If you hit and deal damage to a creature in your ape's reach, the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

AdvancedManeuver.Note: A living creature hit with this Strike is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit).

Bacallia.EffectNote: Strikes that deal damage a creature in your bacallia's reach make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn.

Beetle.EffectNote: Your Strikes that deal damage either make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Off-Guard]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn or move the target 5 feet away from the beetle (this is forced movement). The target chooses which effect occurs.

Bird.EffectNote: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until it removes the bleed damage.

Cat.EffectNote: Your Strikes that deal damage to a creature within your cat's reach make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Off-Guard]{Off-Guard}.

Elephant.EffectNote: Targets within your elephant's reach that you hit and deal damage take a –4 status penalty to purely auditory Perception checks. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.3EGbKKD73gGbSWIa]{Effect: Elephant Support Benefit (Penalty)}

Elk.EffectNote: If you hit and deal damage to a creature within your elk's reach, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

FlyingSquirrel.EffectNote: If your Strike damages a creature in your giant flying squirrel's reach, that creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.lACoOtINmUb1fTMY]{Effect: Flying Squirrel Support Benefit (Penalty)}

Medic.Note: When a creature takes damage from a sharpshooter's ranged Strike, it takes a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round, or a –10-foot circumstance penalty if the attack was a critical hit. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.GXWxbmqTJApVu0f3]{Effect: Experienced Sharpshooter}

Berserker.Note: When a berserker takes damage, they gain a +1 status bonus to their next damage roll before the end of your next turn. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.oM4smdqElgYmPzae]{Effect: Berserker Follower Ability}

Sharpshooter.Note: When the sharpshooter Takes Aim, they also ignore the target's concealment.

Ghost.EffectNote: If you hit and deal damage to a creature in your ghost's reach, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

GiantRockTuatara.EffectNote: Strikes that deal damage to a creature in your giant rock tuatara's reach make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the end of your next turn.

GiantWasp.EffectNote: If you hit and deal damage to a creature within your giant wasp's reach, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Hyena.EffectNote: When you hit a creature in the hyena's reach with a Strike, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Mole.EffectNote: If you hit and damage a creature adjacent to your mole, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until it moves from its current position.

MonitorLizard.EffectNote: If your Strike damages a foe, any time the foe attempts an action with the manipulate trait until the end of your next turn, it must attempt a DC 5 Flat Check. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.eXABjTK48R1xCvOZ]{Effect: Monitor Lizard Support Benefit (Penalty)}
MonitorLizard.ManipulateNote: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5|showDC:all]. On a failure, the action is disrupted.

Moth.EffectNote: If you damage a Concealed or Hidden creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a DC 3 Flat Check to target it if it's concealed, or DC 9 Flat Check if it's hidden. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.Db0Vtobv3v4Iybj5]{Effect: Moth Support Benefit (Penalty)}

Rhinoceros.EffectNote: The first creature within your rhino's reach that you hit and deal damage to before the start of your next turn becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.

RidingTarantula.EffectNote: If you hit and deal damage to a creature your riding tarantula threatens, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] whenever it takes a concentrate action or that action is lost. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.crYJGMzeiXh8xve3]{Effect: Riding Tarantula Support Benefit (Penalty)}
RidingTarantula.ConcentrateNote: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5|showDC:all]. On a failure, the action is disrupted.

Roc.EffectNote: Your Strikes that damage a creature that your roc threatens push the target 5 feet away from your roc.

EffectNote.SupportBenefit: The target takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to use reactions triggered by your actions. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.agTdJDFIKuduum1p]{Effect: Severed Head Support Benefit (Penalty)}

EffectNote.Success: Any creature damaged by the attack becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

TerrorBird.EffectNote: Your Strikes that deal damage to the chosen creature make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.

UmbrellaMushroom.EffectNote: Your Strikes that damage a creature within your umbrella mushroom's reach becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}. This effect has the poison trait.

WarPig.EffectNote: If you hit and deal damage to a creature within your war pig's reach, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.
